title: Support Icon Bug
body:
So I main as a Support 
And It wont let me get the Support Icon.

When I played the first 5 out of 5, there was a message saying I had one less game to go.
But after game 5, It didn't show up.

I've played about 20 games since then.
an you please fix this.

replies.body: Valkyrie Witch is correct - games played to earn these icons only count when playing in Team Builder. Were you in Team Builder for the five games and didn't receive the icon, or were you in Blind Pick / Draft Pick?
I was in TeamBuilder before it got changed. Now its only lvl 25 and up only. But before that, yeah I played the games...
The only mode that gives it is Team Builder.
